posts.post_title: Wanted PSA/BVG 1 or PSA/BVG 2 1909 T206 Magie Error card (with no stains)
posts.post_content: Please send me a private message.

Hey Zone look at the next mils high auction he will have a PSA 2 with perfect eyes appeal for sale , i saw the card at the boston show.
